name: Stuck In Space (BenKerr)
description:
Stuck in Space was made for the Zero Hour Game Jam 2021. In the game you play as an astronaut who has control of his own gravity! You solve three puzzles in order to get to the end! Shoot Boxes to control their gravity!

All assets and Code where made during the jam excluding the font.

The font used can be found here - https://www.dafont.com/minecraft.font
